Name: Dig 2
Description: Reveal the top 2 Landscape cards from your space

Name: Dig 3
Description: Reveal the top 3 Landscape cards from your space

Name: Survey
Description: Choose a space adjacent (not diagonal) to you. Look at all of the Landscape cards there.

Name: Tunnel
Description: If you are on a space lower than Surface, move to any space that is the same level as you (for example, move from Subsoil to another space whose highest layer is Subsoil). Continue facing he same direction as before.
